chatbot_training_qa.question: When does the academic year 2025-26 start at Indus University?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: The academic year 2025-26 starts on 1st July 2025 with the beginning of the odd semester (Sem I, III, V, VII, IX).

chatbot_training_qa.question: When does the odd semester start and end?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: The odd semester starts on 1st July 2025. Sem III, V, IX term ends on 17th October 2025. Sem I term ends on 29th November 2025.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When does the even semester start and end?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: The even semester (Sem II, IV, VI, VIII, X) starts on 1st January 2026. IAS term ends on 30th April 2026, and End Semester Theory Exams end by 30th May 2026.

chatbot_training_qa.question: Which semesters run from July to November?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Odd semesters — Sem I, III, V, VII, and IX — run from July 2025 to November 2025.

chatbot_training_qa.question: Which semesters run from January to May?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Even semesters — Sem II, IV, VI, VIII, and X — run from January 2026 to May 2026.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When are the Mid Semester Exams for odd semester 2025?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Mid Semester Exams for the odd semester run from 8th to 23rd September 2025. For Sem III, V, IX the Mid Semester Jury is from 15th to 19th September 2025.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When are the End Semester Exams (ESE) for odd semester?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: For odd semester: ESE Practicals (ESE-PR) run from 27th October to 8th November 2025. End Semester Jury for Sem III, V, IX is 3rd–8th November 2025. Theory End Semester Exams (ESE-THY) run from 10th November to 29th November 2025.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When are the Mid Semester Exams for even semester 2026?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Mid Semester Jury for Sem IV, VI, VIII is from 23rd–26th March 2026, and for Sem II it starts 30th March 2026. Mid Semester Exams overall run from 23rd March to 11th April 2026.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When are the End Semester Exams for even semester 2026?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: For even semester: ESE Practicals are from 1st–9th May 2026. IAS End Semester Jury is 4th–9th May 2026 and exams from 11th–16th May 2026. Theory End Semester Exams run from 11th–30th May 2026.

chatbot_training_qa.question: Is there a winter vacation? When is it?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Yes. December 2025 is the full winter vacation month, from 1st to 31st December 2025. It falls between the odd and even semesters.

chatbot_training_qa.question: Is there a summer vacation? When is it?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Yes. June 2026 is the full summer vacation month, from 1st to 30th June 2026. It comes after the even semester ends.

chatbot_training_qa.question: Are there exams during the December vacation?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Yes. Sem I End Semester Jury is held on 4th–5th December 2025, and Sem I End Semester Theory Exams are from 8th–13th December 2025. RSP-1 also runs from 15th–27th December 2025. All these are during the winter vacation for repeater/first-time Sem I students.

chatbot_training_qa.question: Are there exams during the June vacation?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Yes. Even semester backlog/repeater End Semester Exams are held during June 2026, the summer vacation period.

chatbot_training_qa.question: What is ESE-THY in the academic calendar?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: ESE-THY stands for End Semester Exam – Theory. These are the written theory examinations at the end of each semester.

chatbot_training_qa.question: What is ESE-PR in the academic calendar?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: ESE-PR stands for End Semester Exam – Practical. These are the practical/lab examinations held before the theory exams at the end of each semester.

chatbot_training_qa.question: What does MID mean in the academic calendar?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: MID refers to Mid Semester Examinations held approximately halfway through each semester.

chatbot_training_qa.question: What does REP-REM mean in the academic calendar?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: REP-REM stands for Repeater and Remedial classes/exams. These are held for students who need to repeat or improve their performance in certain subjects, usually after mid semester exams.

chatbot_training_qa.question: What does REM mean in the academic calendar?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: REM stands for Remedial classes — additional classes to help students bridge gaps in learning before End Semester Exams.

chatbot_training_qa.question: What does REP mean in December and June months?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: REP in December and June indicates these are vacation months where Repeater End Semester Exams are scheduled. December is for odd semester (Sem I) repeaters, and June is for even semester repeaters.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When is Diwali holiday in 2025-26?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Diwali holidays are from 20th to 25th October 2025.

chatbot_training_qa.question: What are all the public holidays in the academic year 2025-26?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: The holidays are: Raksha Bandhan (9 Aug), Independence Day (15 Aug), Janmashtami (16 Aug), Ganesh Chaturthi (27 Aug), Lal Bahadur Shastri Jayanti (2 Oct), Diwali (20–25 Oct), Makar Sankranti (14 Jan), Republic Day (26 Jan), Shiv Ratri (15 Feb), Dhuleti (4 Mar), Ram Navami (27 Mar), Mahavir Jayanti (1 Apr).

chatbot_training_qa.question: When does Semester 1 start for ACPC batch students?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: Semester 1 for new students admitted through ACPC tentatively starts on 18th August 2025, as per the ACPC calendar.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When does the INSTINCTS festival happen in 2025-26?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: INSTINCTS 2K26 is scheduled from 11th to 14th March 2026 at iSAC. The SETUK 2026 Week at IITE also runs 11th–14th March 2026.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When is the Winter Collaborative Program?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: The Winter Collaborative Program 2025 runs from 17th November to 30th November 2025.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When is the Summer Collaborative Program?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: The Summer Collaborative Program 2026 runs from 18th May to 6th June 2026.

chatbot_training_qa.question: What is RSP-1 in the academic calendar?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: RSP-1 is a Remedial/Special Program period that runs from 15th to 27th December 2025 during the winter vacation.

chatbot_training_qa.question: When does IAS (Architecture School) semester end in 2025-26?
chatbot_training_qa.answer: For odd semester, IAS Sem III, V, IX starts 1st July 2025. For even semester, IAS Sem II, IV, VI, VIII TERM END is 30th April 2026. IAS Thesis Semester Final Jury is 8th–10th June 2026 during summer vacation.
